data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bernardi, Leopoldo Ferreira de Oliveira, Borges-Filho, Elmir Lucio (2018): Neocarusspelaion sp. n. (Parasitiformes, Opilioacaridae), a new species of cave dwelling Neocarus from Minas Gerais state, Brazil. Subterranean Biology 27: 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.27.25777, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.27.25777
